body: Hmm. I think we'd lose people if it opened up a new tab. I like 2, but I see your concern about string length. I think 3 is a fine option as well. Alternatively, we could just use 7 buttons with these labels and skip radio buttons. I'm sure @rjweiss has insights into what issues that might generate. Rebecca?
